alert.note: Alert for Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:07PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Shiawassee County through 745 PM EDT... At 707 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elsie, or 9 miles northwest of Owosso, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Henderson around 725 PM EDT. Owosso around 740 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bennington and Carland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
